description: This file declares the 'Notification' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace. The class represents a JSON RPC notification message, inheriting from a base Message class, with methods to convert to string and validate the message.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: A class representing a JSON RPC Notification message, inheriting from WPEFramework::Core::JSONRPC::Message. It provides methods to serialize the message to a string and to check its validity.

methods.name: ~Notification
methods.description: Default destructor for the Notification class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Serializes the notification message to a string.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the notification message is valid.
